Agility: d12 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Anemic: -2 Vigor (resist disease, sickness, fatigue, and environment)
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Fighting: (agi) d12 Shooting: (agi) d6
Battle: (sma) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Faith: (spi) d6 Psionics: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Attractive: +1 Performance (attracted target)/+1 Persuasion (attracted target)
Fame: +1 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Work The Room: Gains additional Performance or Persuasion die to Support 1/rd
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 18; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (10 points): Arcane Background (Gifted); Arcane Resistance; Attractive; Block; Brawler; Command; Counterattack; Extraction; Fame; First Strike; Frenzy; Level Headed; Luck; Martial Artist; Nerves Of Steel; Rapid Fire; Rapid Recharge; Rich; Sweep; Tactician; Tough As Nails; Weapon Master; Work The Room Hindrances: Anemic; Cautious; Illiterate; Poverty Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Cautious: Requires a detailed plan before acting
Command: R5" Commanded gain +1 to recover from Shaken or Stunned
Fame: 2x fee from performing
Illiterate: Cannot read or write
Luck: +1 Benny each session
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Rich: 3x starting funds
Combat
Parry: 8 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Kevlar Vest Shield: None Weapons: M1919; M2 Browning (2d10 R50" AP 4); Sawed Off DB; Unarmed (+1 d8+d4)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +6 Parry
Martial Artist: +1 Unarmed attack/+1 Unarmed damage Step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcane Resistance: Foes suffer -2 arcane skill and arcane damage when targeting self
Block-1: -1 foe Gang Up bonus
Counterattack: May make a free attack after a failed foe attack 1/rd
Extraction: Negates attack of 1 foes during withdrawal
First Strike: May make a free attack when a foe moves into reach 1/rd
Frenzy: May use an additional Fighting attack die 1/rd
Level Headed: May choose from 2 Action Cards
Nerves Of Steel: Ignores 1 points of Wound penalties
Rapid Fire: May increase ROF by 1 1/rd
Sweep: May make -2 attack on all within reach
Tactician: R5" May distribute 1 Action Cards to commanded each rd
Tough As Nails: Takes 4 Wounds before becoming incapacitated
Weapon Master-1: +d8 damage on a melee attack Raise
Arcana
Power Count: 1 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
